Introducing our ultra-slim edge-lit sign boards, crafted with a profile of less than 45 mm ‚Äî a seamless blend of innovation, aesthetics, and engineering built to outperform conventional signage.

author: aryan kansal

title: sample post 2
content:
Introducing Vardhman's Indigenous ALCMS for Mid to Small Airports

At Vardhman Airport Solutions (VAS), we champion the Make in India initiative with our cutting-edge Airfield Lighting Control and Monitoring Systems (ALCMS). Our PLC-based system, successfully deployed at Ahmedabad (2023), Aurangabad (2024), and Calicut (2025) airports, prioritizes operational efficiency, safety, and cost-effectiveness.

Key Features of VAS ALCMS:

- Innovative touchscreen interface for enhanced user experience
- Reliable ON/OFF operations and brightness regulation through hardwired communication
- ICAO compliance with diagnostics for % lamp failure and insulation resistance
- Scalable future upgrades and minimal retraining for ATC teams
- Robust service support for maintenance and advancements
author: aryan kansal
